entry.source: This is a request for you four Samurai. {F804,5}Bump off{F801}that Koba Saburo{F804,0} who's squatting in Club Milton{F801}in Shibuya. We need your help to keep our boys{F801}safe. Though we take no responsibility for any{F801}injuries or deaths as a result of this quest...{F801}
